item.title: Confusing Consistency: CAP vs ACID
item.description: Effective communication requires getting definitions right. Very often the same word can have different meanings and lead to confusion. Good example of that would be term Consistency. In this article we will take a look at consistency in CAP and ACID and differences between them. Let’s start with defining CAP and ACID.
